entry.string: Ratings is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Reteengs is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: The ratings module is a utility module that allows you to add a rating type to any content module that supports hooks.
entry.translation: Zee reteengs mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole-a thet elloos yuoo tu edd a reteeng type-a tu uny cuntent mudoole-a thet sooppurts huuks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: From the Modules Administration configure the ratings hook with any content module that you would like to allow a rating to happen. You can configure the appearance of the ratings from the configure portion in the ratings administration.
entry.translation: Frum zee Mudooles Edmeenistreshun cunffeegoore-a zee reteengs huuk veet uny cuntent mudoole-a thet yuoo vuoold leeke-a tu elloo a reteeng tu heppee. Yuoo cun cunffeegoore-a zee eppeerunce-a ooff zee reteengs frum zee cunffeegoore-a purshun in zee reteengs edmeenistreshun.

entry.string: There are no included blocks at this time.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The ratings hook is a display hook to allow content modules to rate content.
entry.translation: Zee reteengs huuk is a deespley huuk tu elloo cuntent mudooles tu rete-a cuntent. Um de hur de hur de hur.
